item.title: Republican Donor Ken Griffin Criticizes Trump Over Fellow CEOs Having to ‘Suck Up’ to the White House
item.description: The Citadel CEO warned that corporate success is starting to hinge on political allegiance instead of performance.

item.title: Wall Street’s Sell-Off Signals Trouble Ahead, but Not Because of an AI Bubble
item.description: This week’s market decline has tech investors heading for the doors.

item.title: Masha Bucher Appears in Epstein Files as a Founder Fixer
item.description: The Day One Ventures founder continues to invest in hard tech companies, like brain tech startup Merge Labs, founded by Sam Altman.

item.title: Bill Gates Responds to New Jeffrey Epstein Email Controversy
item.description: He claims the information in the messages is ‘false.’

item.title: Why Leaders Need to Listen More
item.description: When leadership breaks down, it is rarely because the strategy was wrong. More often, it is because something important was missed.
